Author: kavinkul
Description: Move creatures from one side of the river to the other using a limited-size boat while avoiding conflicts between each creature. Tags: 5-buttons, wooden frame, 1 screen, red-button, black orb, gold ring
Name: Wolf, Goat, and Cabbage

Souvenir.Explanation: A module could ask for the creatures on the display and Alcuin number of the group.
